element.label: Explanation of Benefit Base Resource for IDR. Ignore in DD Generation
element.definition: ExplanationOfBenefitBase definition

element.label: Last Updated
element.definition: This field represents the last time that an ExplanationOfBenefit was updated.

element.label: Final action indicator
element.definition: The final action indicator is used to indicate the finality of a claim.

element.label: Beneficiary ID
element.definition: The current beneficiary ID associated with the claim. Used for the patient reference.

element.label: Claim Type Code
element.definition: The claim type code is used to identify the type of claim.

element.label: Claim Unique ID
element.definition: The claim unique ID is a unique ID for the claim within the source system.

element.label: Claim Control Number.
element.definition: This field is an identification value assigned by a MAC. It provides a reference number for the control and monitoring of specific claims, and to differentiate between claims for the beneficiary. This field can also be used to link adjudicated and partially-adjudicated claims.

element.label: Claim from date.
element.definition: The first day on the billing statement covering services rendered to the beneficiary (a.k.a. 'Statement Covers From Date'). For DME claims, this may be in advance.

element.label: Claim thru date.
element.definition: The last day on the billing statement covering services rendered to the beneficiary (a.k.a 'Statement Covers Thru Date').

element.label: Claim effective date.
element.definition: The claim effective date.

element.label: Claim source ID.
element.definition: The claim source ID identifies where the information for a claim came from.

element.label: Provider billing NPI number.
element.definition: The NPI number responsible for a claim. This is consistent across all NCH types. Of note, DME may use CLM_SRVC_PRVDR_NPI_NUM, too.

element.label: Procedure List
element.definition: List of procedures.

element.label: Diagnosis List
element.definition: List of diagnoses.

element.label: Supporting info components
element.definition: List of supporting info

element.label: Line item components
element.definition: List of line items

element.label: Claim Query Code
element.definition: Code indicating the type of claim record being processed with respect to payment (debit/credit indicator; interim/final indicator).

element.label: Institutional Components
element.definition: The components of an ExplanationOfBenefit that are specific to an institutional claim

element.label: Part A/B Coinsurance Liability Amount
element.definition: The amount of money for which the intermediary has determined that the beneficiary is liable for Part A/B coinsurance on the institutional claim.

element.label: Blood Deductible Liability Amount
element.definition: The amount of money for which the intermediary determined the beneficiary is liable for the blood deductible.

element.label: Inpatient Noncovered Charge Amount
element.definition: The non-covered charges for all accommodations and services, reported on an inpatient claim (used for internal NCHMQA editing purposes).

element.label: Inpatient/Outpatient Total Deduction Amount
element.definition: The total of all Part A/B and blood deductibles and coinsurance amounts on the claim.

element.label: Near Line Record Identification Code
element.definition: A code defining the type of claim record being processed. NOTE: this is sourced from CLM_DCMTN.

element.label: Operating Indirect Medical Education Amount
element.definition: This is one component of the total amount that is payable on PPS claims, and reflects the IME (indirect medical education) payments for operating expenses (such as labor) for the claim.  NOTE: This field is a sum of the CLM_VAL.CLM_VAL_AMT amounts where CLM_VAL_CD is the IME share code.

element.label: Operating Disproportionate Share Amount
element.definition: This is one component of the total amount that is payable on prospective payment system (PPS) claims and reflects the DSH (disproportionate share hospital) payments for operating expenses (such as labor) for the claim. NOTE: This field is a sum of the CLM_VAL.CLM_VAL_AMT amounts where CLM_VAL_CD is the disproportionate share code.

element.label: FI Number
element.definition: The identification number assigned by CMS to a fiscal intermediary (FI) authorized to process institutional claim records.

element.label: FI Claim Process Date
element.definition: The date the fiscal intermediary completes processing and releases the institutional claim to the CMS common working file (CWF; stored in the NCH).

element.label: Payment Amount
element.definition: The Medicare claim payment amount.

element.label: Care Team Provider Family name
element.definition: This field represent's the care team provider's family name. This will be populated via NPPES data on the basis of NPI.

element.label: Attending Physician NPI
element.definition: On an institutional claim, the national provider identifier (NPI) is a unique number assigned to identify the physician who has overall responsibility for the beneficiary's care and treatment.

element.label: Care Team Provider Family name
element.definition: This field represent's the care team provider's family name. This will be populated via NPPES data on the basis of NPI.

element.label: Operating Physician NPI
element.definition: On an institutional claim, the National Provider Identifier (NPI) number assigned to uniquely identify the physician with the primary responsibility for performing the surgical procedure(s).

element.label: Care Team Provider Family name
element.definition: This field represent's the care team provider's family name. This will be populated via NPPES data on the basis of NPI.

element.label: Other Physician NPI
element.definition: On an institutional claim, the National Provider Identifier (NPI) number assigned to uniquely identify the other physician associated with the institutional claim.

element.label: Care Team Provider Family name
element.definition: This field represent's the care team provider's family name. This will be populated via NPPES data on the basis of NPI.

element.label: Rendering Physician NPI
element.definition: This variable is the National Provider Identifier (NPI) for the physician who rendered the services.
